meanings.definition: A person who takes part in a riot.
meanings.sent1: The rioter was arrested for causing chaos in the city.
meanings.sent2: The police quickly apprehended the rioter before more damage could be done.
meanings.sent3: The rioter seemed to think breaking windows was a fun game.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of chaos, the rioter stood out like a flame in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The image of the rioter smashing storefronts lingered in the minds of the onlookers.

meanings.definition: To take part in a riot.
meanings.sent1: During the protest, some individuals chose to riot and cause trouble.
meanings.sent2: The group decided to riot after the controversial decision was announced.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully rioted in the park, pretending to overthrow an imaginary ruler.
meanings.sent4: Emotions rioted within him, urging him to join the chaos outside.
meanings.sent5: The urge to riot against injustice burned fiercely in her heart.
